desc: Secured 1st Runner-Up in the App Showcase category at AIUB CS FEST 2024. Competed against 20+ teams, demonstrating innovative mobile application development with technical proficiency and presentation skills to industry judges.
Published research on Medical BERT architectures for multi-label Adverse Drug Reaction classification. Benchmarked domain-specific LLMs on PsyTAR dataset using PyTorch and Hugging Face Transformers.

Presented research on emerging issues in changing climatic scenarios at the 2nd South Asian Conference. Conducted statistical analysis and data visualization on climate data trends for the South Asian region.

Active open source contributor with 26 repositories and 36+ GitHub stars. Top projects: StudentManagementSystem (⭐17), HotelManagementSystem (⭐15). Expertise in Java, Python, C++, and Android development.

Led team of 5 developers to create 'Mario's Multiverse Adventure' - a 2D platformer with OpenGL, SFML audio, and SQLite. Features 3 unique levels, collision detection, and physics engine. YouTube demo available.
